Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • Polygon
        • Rectangle
  • public class Rectangle
extends Polygon
    Rectangle Rectangle shape we can calculate Perimeter and Area of the Rectangle. and print it the shape and it's descriptions. also we can determined if the Rectangle is Square. It is Polygon's extended class.
    Since:
    2020-04-09
